descriptor.short_desc:
Helps Promote Hair Thickening: Botanic Hearth Rosemary Mint Shampoo for women and men gently cleanses and thickens hair strands by strengthening hair follicles and fighting hair breakage, making it an ideal hair thickening Shampoo 

Helps Promote Hair Growth:  The Rosemary Shampoo for hair growth helps fight hair loss with the present ingredients such as jojoba oil, collagen and argan that help nourish and strengthen hair, making it an ideal shampoo for hair fall control 

Supports a Healthy Scalp: The hair growth Shampoo for women and men provides long-lasting moisture and improves hair texture, promoting overall hair health

Long-Lasting Freshness: The refreshing aroma of Rosemary Hair Shampoo for men and women lingers on hair throughout the day, awakening your senses
Ethically Sourced: Botanic Hearth hair growth shampoo for men and women is ethically sourced, cruelty free, free from harsh chemicals and allergens

descriptor.name: Botanic Hearth Argan & Keratin Conditioner , 245ml
descriptor.short_desc:
Smoothens and Repairs: Botanic Hearth Argan & Keratin Conditioner for frizzy hair helps smoothen and strengthen hair strands. It is ideal for those looking for conditioners for dry and frizzy hair  

Helps Reduce Frizz: Argan Oil Conditioner tames unruly frizz and flyaways with ease, creating a sleek, manageable, and salon-worthy finish, making it an ideal hair conditioner for dry frizzy hair 

Reduces Breakage & Split Ends: The hair Conditioner for women and men helps fight breakage with the strengthening agent Keratin in addition to removing split ends. This makes it a go-to conditioner for dry hair  

Nourishes Deeply: The Keratin Shampoo and Conditioner work together to deeply nourish hair bonds weakened by color or hair treatments. It is ideal for those looking for a Conditioner for damaged hair  

Ethically Sourced: Botanic Hearth hair Conditioner for men and women is ethically sourced, cruelty-free, free from harsh chemicals and allergens

descriptor.name: Botanic Hearth Mandarin Orange & Honey Body Wash, 245ml
descriptor.short_desc:
Adds Radiant Glow: Botanic Hearth Mandarin Orange & Honey Body Wash for women and men helps brighten skin after every use and helps achieve an even skin tone 

Nourishes Skin: Honey Shower Gel helps retain moisture in the skin and keeps skin hydrated and moisturized, which in turn prevents dryness or irritation  

Minimises Skin Redness: The soothing and calming properties of Mandarin Orange Body Wash helps reduce skin redness and sensitivity, promoting an overall healthier appearance 

Suitable for all Skin Types: The body wash for men and women is suitable for all skin types and can be treated as an alternative to shower gel for men or women 

Ethically Sourced: Botanic Hearth products are ethically sourced, cruelty-free, free from harsh chemicals and allergens

descriptor.name: Botanic Hearth Oat & Niacinamide Face Wash, 100ml
descriptor.short_desc:
Gently Cleanses & Removes Impurities: Botanic Hearth Oat & Niacinamide Face Wash for women and men deeply cleanses all impurities, and helps achieve smooth & supple skin

Soothes Sensitive Skin: The Oats Face Wash comes with anti-inflammatory properties that help soothe skin, making it suitable for all skin types and ideal for sensitive skin 

Helps Reduce Acne: The Face Wash for men and women helps fight excess sebum that in turn helps reduce acne, making it a preferable choice for those looking for a face wash for acne prone skin

Reduces Blemishes & Dark Spots: Niacinamide is known to produce ceramides that help minimise blemishes and dark spots, making it an ideal choice to calm skin or use it as a face wash for dry skin 
Ethically Sourced & Cruelty-Free: Botanic Hearth products are ethically sourced, cruelty-free, free from harsh chemicals and allergens
